SEARCH
Package controller.appointment

Class AppointmentManager

java.lang.Object
controller.appointment.AppointmentManager
public class AppointmentManager extends Object
The AppointmentManager class provides utility methods for scheduling Appointments.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentManager

      public AppointmentManager()

  • Method Details

    • doesAppointmentExist

      public static Boolean doesAppointmentExist(String appointmentID)
      Checks if an appointment with the specified ID exists in the appointment database. This method attempts to retrieve an appointment by its ID from the appointment database. If the appointment is found, it returns true; otherwise, it returns false. Any exceptions during the lookup are caught and result in a false return value.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to check.
      Returns:
      true if an appointment with the specified ID exists; false otherwise.

    • getAppointmentByPatientAndID

      public static Appointment getAppointmentByPatientAndID(String patientID, String appointmentID)
      Retrieves an appointment by patient ID and appointment ID. This method searches through all available appointments to find a match for the specified patient ID and appointment ID. If a matching appointment is found, it is returned; otherwise, a message is printed and null is returned.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient associated with the appointment.
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The matching Appointment object if found; null if no match is found.

    • getAppointmentByID

      public static Appointment getAppointmentByID(String appointmentID)
      Retrieves an appointment by its ID from the appointment database. This method attempts to fetch an appointment using the provided appointment ID from the appointment database. If the appointment is found, it is returned; otherwise, an error message is printed and null is returned.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Appointment object if found; null if no matching appointment is found.

    • getPatientAppointment

      public static List<Appointment> getPatientAppointment(String patientID)
      Retrieves all appointments associated with a specific patient ID. This method iterates through all available appointments and collects those that match the specified patient ID. The resulting list of appointments is returned.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects associated with the specified patient. If no appointments are found, an empty list is returned.

    • getPatientAppointmentsByStatus

      public static List<Appointment> getPatientAppointmentsByStatus(String patientID, AppointmentStatus status)
      Retrieves all appointments for a specific patient with a specified status. This method first obtains all appointments associated with a given patient ID. It then filters these appointments based on their status, returning only those that match the provided AppointmentStatus.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose appointments are to be retrieved.
      status - The status of the appointments to filter by (e.g., scheduled, completed).
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects that match the specified status. If no matching appointments are found, an empty list is returned.

    • createAppointment

      public static void createAppointment(Appointment appointment) throws ModelAlreadyExistsException
      Adds a new appointment to the appointment database. This method attempts to add a provided Appointment object to the appointment database. If an appointment with the same ID already exists, a ModelAlreadyExistsException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The Appointment object to be added to the database.
      Throws:
      ModelAlreadyExistsException - If an appointment with the same ID already exists in the database.

    • scheduleNewAppointment

      public static void scheduleNewAppointment(String patientID, String doctorID, int timeSlotID, String appointmentDate) throws ModelAlreadyExistsException
      Creates and schedules a new appointment for a specified patient and doctor. This method generates a new appointment ID and creates a new Appointment object with the provided patient ID, doctor ID, time slot ID, and appointment date. The new appointment is added to the appointment database. If an appointment with the same ID already exists, a ModelAlreadyExistsException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient for the new appointment.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor for the new appointment.
      timeSlotID - The time slot ID for the appointment.
      appointmentDate - The date of the appointment.
      Throws:
      ModelAlreadyExistsException - If an appointment with the same ID already exists in the database.

    • getAllAppointments

      public static List<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      Retrieves all appointments from the appointment database. This method fetches and returns a list of all Appointment objects stored in the appointment database.
      Returns:
      A list of all Appointment objects in the database.

    • getDoctorAppointmentsRequests

      public static List<Appointment> getDoctorAppointmentsRequests(String doctorID)
      Retrieves pending appointment requests for a specific doctor. This method fetches all appointments from the database and filters them to return a list of appointments associated with the specified doctor ID that have a status of AppointmentStatus.PENDING.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose pending appointment requests are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects that match the specified doctor ID and have a status of pending. If no such appointments are found, an empty list is returned.

    • getScheduledDoctorAppointments

      public static ArrayList<Appointment> getScheduledDoctorAppointments(String doctorID)
      Retrieves approved appointments for a specific doctor. This method fetches all appointments from the database and filters them to return a list of appointments associated with the specified doctor ID that have a status of AppointmentStatus.APPROVED.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose approved appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects that match the specified doctor ID and have a status of approved. If no such appointments are found, an empty list is returned.

    • updateAppointment

      public static void updateAppointment(Appointment newAppointment) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Updates an existing appointment in the appointment database. This method updates an appointment in the database with the provided Appointment object. If the appointment does not exist in the database, a ModelNotFoundException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      newAppointment - The Appointment object containing the updated details.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If the appointment to be updated cannot be found in the database.

    • cancelAppointment

      public static void cancelAppointment(String patientID, String appointmentID)
      Cancels an existing appointment for a specified patient. This method attempts to find the appointment associated with the provided patient ID and appointment ID. If found, it updates the appointment's status to AppointmentStatus.CANCELLED and saves the changes. If the appointment cannot be found, an error message is displayed.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose appointment is to be cancelled.
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to be cancelled.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public static void rescheduleAppointment(String patientID, String appointmentID, int timeSlotID, String newDate) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Reschedules an existing appointment for a specified patient. This method attempts to find the appointment associated with the provided patient ID and appointment ID. If found, it updates the appointment's date and time to the new values, sets its status to AppointmentStatus.PENDING, and saves the changes. If the appointment cannot be found, a ModelNotFoundException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose appointment is to be rescheduled.
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to be rescheduled.
      timeSlotID - The new time slot ID for the rescheduled appointment.
      newDate - The new date for the rescheduled appointment.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If the appointment to be rescheduled cannot be found.

    • approveAppointment

      public static void approveAppointment(String doctorID, String appointmentID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Approves an appointment for a specific doctor and updates its status to approved. This method retrieves the appointment associated with the provided doctor and appointment ID. If the appointment is found, it updates the appointment's status to AppointmentStatus.APPROVED. Additionally, a new AppointmentOutcome is created with a status of AppointmentOutcomeStatus.PENDING and saved. The appointment and its outcome are then updated in the system.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor approving the appointment.
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to be approved.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If the appointment cannot be found for the given doctor and appointment ID.

    • rejectAppointment

      public static void rejectAppointment(String doctorID, String appointmentID) throws ModelNotFoundException
      Rejects an appointment for a specific doctor and updates its status to rejected. This method retrieves the appointment associated with the provided doctor and appointment ID. If the appointment is found, its status is updated to AppointmentStatus.REJECTED. The updated appointment is then saved to the system.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor rejecting the appointment.
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to be rejected.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - If the appointment cannot be found for the given doctor and appointment ID.

    • getAllDoctorAppointments

      public static ArrayList<Appointment> getAllDoctorAppointments(String doctorID)
      Retrieves all appointments for a specific doctor. This method filters and returns a list of all appointments that are associated with the given doctor ID. It searches through all the available appointments and collects those whose `doctorID` matches the provided value.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects for the specified doctor. If no appointments are found, an empty list is returned.

    • getBookedAppointmentsOfDoctor

      public static Map<Integer,List<String>> getBookedAppointmentsOfDoctor(String doctorID)
      Retrieves the booked appointments of a specific doctor grouped by day of the week. This method iterates through all the appointments of the specified doctor and filters them based on their status (either PENDING or APPROVED). It groups the appointments by their time slots and day of the week (from Monday to Sunday), returning a map that associates each day of the week with a list of appointment time slots for that day.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose booked appointments are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A map where the key is the day of the week (1 for Monday, 7 for Sunday), and the value is a list of time slots (represented as integers) for the doctor on that day.

    • getAppointmentWithIncompleteOutcome

      public static ArrayList<Appointment> getAppointmentWithIncompleteOutcome(List<Appointment> appointments, String doctorID)
      Retrieves appointments with incomplete outcomes for a specific doctor. This method checks all appointments and compares them with the outcomes associated with the specified doctor. It filters out appointments that have outcomes marked as PENDING, indicating that the outcomes have not yet been completed. It returns a list of appointments that are awaiting outcomes.
      Parameters:
      appointments - The list of appointments to be checked for incomplete outcomes.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose appointments are to be checked.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments that have an incomplete (PENDING) outcome for the specified doctor.

    • isTimeSlotAvailable

      public static Boolean isTimeSlotAvailable(Doctor doctor, DayOfWeek day)
      Checks if a doctor has available time slots on a specific day. This method checks the doctor's appointment availability for a given day of the week. It retrieves the doctor's appointment availability and checks if there are any time slots scheduled for the specified day. If availability is found, it returns true; otherwise, false.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The doctor whose availability is being checked.
      day - The day of the week to check for availability.
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating whether the doctor has available time slots on the given day.
